title: Add a TypeScript Lambda Function to a project
description: Add a TypeScript Lambda Function to a project

project.description: The project to add the lambda function to
project.x-prompt: Select the project to add the lambda function to

functionName.description: The name of the function to add
functionName.x-prompt: What name would you like your Lambda Function to have? i.e: MyFunction

functionPath.description: Optional subdirectory within the project source directory to add the function to
functionPath.x-prompt: Enter the path within the project source directory to add the function to (e.g. 'lambda-functions/')

eventSource.description: Optional event source schema to use for the lambda function
eventSource.x-prompt: Enter the event source schema to use for the lambda function

iacProvider.description: The preferred IaC provider. By default this is inherited from your initial selection.
iacProvider.x-prompt: Which provider would you like to manage your infrastructure? (default: Inherit)
